name: TankWar Demo
description:
Players control their own tank, competing with other players in various game modes, including Capture the Flag, Control Points, Deathmatch, and Team Deathmatch. The game features crystals as an in-game currency, which players can obtain through various means such as winning matches.

These crystals can be exchanged for various items and upgrades to the player's tank like hulls, turrets, protection modules, paints, alterations for the turret/hull etc. Tanks can also receive minor and major upgrades to the hulls, turrets, etc. The game also implements a rank-system, which offers players access to new equipment for their tank and matches with other high-ranked players and a clan-system, used to create Clan vs. Clan battles.
